title: Week Review: Negation Mastery
goal: Demonstrate mastery of negation vocabulary and grammar.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Quick recall — all 8 gismu:

certain → ?    assert → ?
doubt → ?      agree → ?
true → ?       deny → ?
false → ?      correct → ?

(Answers: birti, xusra, senpi, tugni, jetnu, natfe, jitfa, drani)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

Negation Types

Cmavo Type Meaning
na Bridi "It is not the case that..."
na'e Scalar "Other than..."
to'e Scalar "Opposite of..."
no'e Scalar "Neutral..."

Week 16 Vocabulary

Lojban English Lojban English
birti certain xusra assert
senpi doubt tugni agree
jetnu true natfe deny
jitfa false drani correct

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate:

  1. birti →
  2. jetnu →
  3. tugni →
  4. natfe →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. doubt →
  2. false →
  3. assert →
  4. correct →
Answers
  1. certain
  2. true
  3. agree
  4. deny
  5. senpi
  6. jitfa
  7. xusra
  8. drani

Part B: Negation Grammar (8 points)

Choose the right negation:

  1. I don't go (whole claim) → ?
  2. This is ugly (opposite) → ?
  3. Neither big nor small → ?
  4. I do something else → ?

Translate:

  1. I didn't eat. → ?
  2. This is not true. → ?
  3. I am uncertain. → ?
  4. I disagree. → ?
Answers
  1. mi na klama
  2. to'e melbi
  3. no'e barda
  4. mi na'e zukte
  5. mi pu na citka
  6. ti na jetnu
  7. mi to'e birti or mi senpi
  8. mi to'e tugni or mi na tugni

Part C: Discussion Sentences (4 points)

Translate:

  1. I am certain that this is true.
  2. I deny that you are correct.
  3. I don't agree with you.
  4. This is false.
Answers
  1. mi birti lo du'u ti jetnu
  2. mi natfe lo du'u do drani
  3. mi na tugni do
  4. ti jitfa

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Have a debate:

Use:

  • Two truth words (jetnu, jitfa)
  • Two discussion words (tugni, natfe)
  • Two negation types

Example:

mi xusra lo du'u ti jetnu
.i do na tugni
.i do natfe lo du'u ti jetnu
.i mi birti .i ti na jitfa

(I assert that this is true. You don't agree. You deny that this is true. I am certain. This is not false.)

Create your own and say it aloud.

Week 16 Complete Reference

Vocabulary (8):

Lojban English Lojban English
birti certain xusra assert
senpi doubt tugni agree
jetnu true natfe deny
jitfa false drani correct

Grammar:

Cmavo Function
na Bridi negation
na'e Other than
to'e Opposite
no'e Neutral

Cumulative vocabulary: ~140 words

Summary

You completed Week 16 on negation. You can now negate claims, express opposites, and discuss truth and agreement.

Next week preview: Week 17 covers questions in depth — ma, mo, xo.
